title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: The statistic illustrates the Minutes of Age Group in the Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in .
In that year , the Minutes of Daily 15-24 Spent Age amounted to 150 .
gold: The graph shows average time spent on social media by various age groups . The highest time spent on social media was by the group aged 45 - 54 at 150 minutes and the lowest time was by the group aged 35 - 44 with only 65 minutes a day just less than the 25 - 34 age group .
